masterlist

summary: dad!harry is gonna be so soft and embarrassing can you imagine sksjsj
question: dad!harry is gonna be so soft and embarrassing can you imagine sksjsj
answer:
oh god dad!harry would be putty with his baby angel and absolutely loves her too much that he doesn’t even complain when she tugs at his hair and would even encourage her to do it!

he’d be all hesitant shaving his stubble he has or the hair he’s growing because he’s pestered of thoughts of “what if she liked me better with these????” and he’s so conflicted with it that he wakes missus up at midnight just to ask for advice?

harry would attend every ballet lesson she has or to every session of every class baby angel wants to go to and he would be THE parent that avoids gossip yet in the same time would be so encapsulated while waiting for her bub to finish, gives the side eye mostly and just huff at whatever he’s hearing.

he would go to every softball and soccer and lacrosse match, would push himself to do better to he can practice his bub (it’s the other way around actually) and would be at every game to cheer, his own varsity jacket he got custom-made with his last name at the back, his bub’s jersey number in the front, the colors of her school as it’s theme and he has foam fingers and all.

overall, dad!harry makes me incredibly soft and sob and soft again

Requests: CLOSED |Harry Styles Masterlist | NHL Masterlist

question: 9 and 74 pleeeeaaseee
answer:
Maybe he said it because he was afraid. Maybe it was because he didn’t want to become too invested too quickly. But he sure as hell knew it wasn’t because he didn’t love her. He did. A lot. It just took him by surprise to hear her say those words. Especially after they had just finished having mind blowing sex and we’re having a little cuddle.

“I think I love you.” (9) She blurted, cuddling into his side as she traced the butterfly on his torso.

Shock. That’s what he felt. In that moment he felt only shock. Perhaps it’s because the declaration caught him off guard, or maybe he wasn’t sure that he heard what she said.

“W-what?!” He gasped, untangling himself from her and sitting up on the bed.

“I said, I think I love you.” She repeated, not missing a beat.

He just stared at her. Giving her absolutely no confirmation or denial that he felt the same; until he spoke again. Running a hand down his face, he let out a long, deep sigh.

“Well you shouldn’t. We’re just fucking. If I would’ve known you were getting too attached I would’ve ended this already. Why didn’t you tell me you were catching feelings?” He asked, sliding on a pair of clean briefs and searching his wardrobe for a new T Shirt.

“What?! Why would you end this? Do you seriously feel nothing for me?” She questioned, pulling herself up off the bed and walking across the room to where he stood by his closet.

“No, I don’t.” He replied, refusing to look at her as he crossed the room once again to retrieve his Vans from under his bed.

“I think you should leave, Y/N. I’m sorry. Keep in touch though, yeah?” He said exiting his bedroom and waiting patiently in the hallway for her to follow him out.

“Seriously, Harry?!” She all but shouted, “keep in touch? The fuck kinda bullshit line is that? You’re acting like we’re two best friends going away to separate universities. I just told you I’m falling in love with you! And all I get is a “keep in touch, yeah?” I don’t think so. Look me in the eye and tell me this meant nothing to you (74). That I mean nothing to you.” Y/N said, pushing at Harry’s chest.

H just stood there wide eyed and stunned.

“I-I can’t. I’m sorry, Y/N. truly I am. You should go.” H said, opening the front door of his house.

“Yeah, you can’t say anything because you’re a fucking coward, Harry. You can’t admit to your feelings! You won’t say you love me, yet you won’t tell me that you don’t. Just tell me this, Harry… had I not said anything today, how long did you plan on keeping me around? Until you got tired of me and found someone better? Another supermodel to warm your bed? Or another pop star perhaps?”

Again, nothing. Complete silence and an emotionless stare.

“Y’know what? Forget it. Forget this whole thing ever even happened. I’m done. Have a nice life. Keep in touch, yeah?” She mimicked in a deep manly voice as she stepped into her Range Rover.

As soon as she pulled out of the drive, H lost it. He fell to his knees and cried. Hard.

blog.name: thelemonandthelime
blog.title: I'm Gin.
blog.description: •●○☆ Quasi-Astrologer • Nature Lover • Harry Styles Enthusiast ☆○●•

summary: So with Harry...he’s an Aquarius but it seems a rather odd one.  That sign is known for being a bit “fly by the seat of your...
question: So with Harry...he’s an Aquarius but it seems a rather odd one.  That sign is known for being a bit “fly by the seat of your pants” but he’s not as  spontaneous as I expected. He’s a list maker and he likes routine.  Any insight into that part of him?
answer:
Harry is not only an Aquarius sun, he’s also an Aquarius Venus, mars, and mercury. Which means he has a stellium (4 or more planets) in Aquarius.  

To answer your initial question, the reason Harry appears to be more structured than your typical Aquarius, is because his mercury and Saturn are conjunct (side by side, or appearing conjoined). Mercury is the planet of communication, how we verbally express ourselves and how we think. Saturn is quite literally the planet of structure, of lessons, rules. Saturn is the task master. Having the permanent energy of structure in direct contact with the energy of the mind creates.. a very structured mind. This man has a VERY serious brain. Someone who enjoys discipline, who follows rules, who wants things to be done right. He will expect to be taken and treated as an authority figure.

In his younger years, before maturity, it may have appeared that he learned a bit slower. He may have stuttered a bit or appeared to have had trouble forming sentences. The reason for this is because Saturn’s energy is heavy. That slow Harry Styles drawl that we now know and love, that deep voice, is all thanks to the conjunction of his Mercury to his Saturn. As he grows and gets older, with the fusing of these two energies, he will become more and more confident in his own thoughts and in his mind. Experience is key for someone like Harry to really grow and cultivate his confidence. 

Another thing that makes Harry seem a little different than the typical Aquarius (though he is still very much an Aquarius), is the fact that he has three of his Aquarian planets in the 4th house. The house that a planet resides in can have a very large effect on that planet, or in Harry’s case, multiple planets. The 4th house is a water house, traditionally ruled by the Moon. The moon governs over emotions (and of the mother, and home. These placements would make Harry a giant Mama’s boy). Him having multiple planets in the literal house of emotions is going to make him an emotional person, even with him being an Aquarius, which is an air sign typically known as the most “aloof” sign. It creates a mixture that is somewhat Aquarius, somewhat Cancer in nature. That cancer, or moon, energy, will create A LOT of drive in him, as cancers are typically one of the most driven signs. Any planets that fall in the 4th house will have some cancer-like qualities. 

With that same thought in mind, look to his actual moon, which is in the sign of Libra, another air sign. His moon resides in the 12th house.. the 12th house is ALSO a water house, creating a moon that carries some Libra like tendencies, mixed with some Pisces like tendencies, in his emotions. So you have almost ALL of his personal planets in water houses, including his moon itself, and this makes for a very emotional Aquarius.

I know those last two paragraphs weren’t part of the question, but I used to wonder before I ever looked at his chart, why he seemed more emotional than the typical Aquarius, and.. well, if you ever wondered, too, then this is why.

reblog.comment:
Harry is not only an Aquarius sun, he’s also an Aquarius Venus, mars, and mercury. Which means he has a stellium (4 or more planets) in Aquarius.  

To answer your initial question, the reason Harry appears to be more structured than your typical Aquarius, is because his mercury and Saturn are conjunct (side by side, or appearing conjoined). Mercury is the planet of communication, how we verbally express ourselves and how we think. Saturn is quite literally the planet of structure, of lessons, rules. Saturn is the task master. Having the permanent energy of structure in direct contact with the energy of the mind creates.. a very structured mind. This man has a VERY serious brain. Someone who enjoys discipline, who follows rules, who wants things to be done right. He will expect to be taken and treated as an authority figure.

In his younger years, before maturity, it may have appeared that he learned a bit slower. He may have stuttered a bit or appeared to have had trouble forming sentences. The reason for this is because Saturn’s energy is heavy. That slow Harry Styles drawl that we now know and love, that deep voice, is all thanks to the conjunction of his Mercury to his Saturn. As he grows and gets older, with the fusing of these two energies, he will become more and more confident in his own thoughts and in his mind. Experience is key for someone like Harry to really grow and cultivate his confidence.
